content.question: For what value of <math alttext="k" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>k</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, if any, will <math alttext="y equals, k times e raised to the negative 2 x power, plus 4 times the cosine of, open parenthesis, 3 x, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math> be a solution to the differential equation <math alttext="y double prime, plus 9 y, equals 26 times e raised to the negative 2 x power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>″</mo></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>9</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>26</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: There is no such value of <math alttext="k" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>k</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>.

skill.text: Skill 3.G: Confirm that solutions are accurate and appropriate.
